com.reportmill.graphics

Class RMBorderStroke

  • java.lang.Object
    • SnapObject
      • com.reportmill.graphics.RMFill
        • com.reportmill.graphics.RMStroke
          • com.reportmill.graphics.RMBorderStroke

  • public class RMBorderStroke
extends RMStroke
    This stroke subclass strokes the rectangular border of a given shape, with option include/exclude individual sides.
